feed.title: Tymik Solutions
feed.subtitle: I am a DevOps Engineer passionate about new technologies and ways to improve applications lifecycle. I have started working as a Systems Administrator and the DevOps role is a natural evolution from Sysadmin for me. In my free time I enjoy riding a motorcycle and doing crossfitter. I would love to travel across the whole Europe on my motorcycle and hopefully even more.

entry.title: Hi there
entry.content:
Hello all!

I hope you will enjoy my site and blog posts here! I will try to provide some interesting technical solutions here on an irregular basis.
entry.summary: These are my first steps with Jekyll based page. I hope to provide some interesting technical posts in the future.
